title: Mean and median of symmetric distributions

content.question: If a probability distribution is symmetric, which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: The mean of the distribution is equal to the median of the distribution.
The interquartile range of the distribution is equal to the standard deviation of the distribution.

content.answer: The mean of the distribution is equal to the median of the distribution.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
